thread.section_title: Le Relais Saint Charles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel with a great location
thread.title_full: Great Hotel with a great location - Review of Le Relais Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pabankboy
title: Great Hotel with a great location
text: We stayed here for 4 days. Great hotel located directly across from the Metro and our room had an incredible view of the Eiffel Tower! Staff was very friendly! The room was a very good size for Paris and it was easy to get everywhere from the hotel. Great place for a vacation stay. We will stay here again!
